com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity

Class InfinitumFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity.InfinitumFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, EventPublisher

    public class InfinitumFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements EventPublisher

    This Fragment extension takes care of framework initialization, provides support for resource injection and event binding, and exposes an InfinitumContext.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 12/18/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
    See Also:
    InfinitumListFragment
